rewrite1:
Begin by adjusting the first paragraph; introduce a space measuring 6 points above it and ensure that the text is not in bold.

Moving on to the seventh paragraph: designate its Outline level as 'Body Text.' Then, alter the font size to 10.5 points and apply a Wave Double underline for emphasis. Finally, adjust the right indent, bringing it in by 1 centimeter to the left.
